House/Ranch question...
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): House/Ranch question...
By Gizmo the Lemur on Saturday, September 7, 2002 - 09:46 pm:

Can someone post something about the ranch/house upgrades such as how to upgrade them? I think I got the best house, but I need to know what it takes to upgrade the barn again. It's been a while since I played this, and I forgot everything about it.

By Master Breeder Wannabe on Sunday, September 15, 2002 - 08:26 pm:

I don't know, but I was wondering what upgrading the barn is for.

By Sharkie on Thursday, October 24, 2002 - 10:48 am:

possible answer:
upgrading the barn helps your critters somehow(i forget if its stress or what) and lets you use bigger critters.

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, October 24, 2002 - 02:47 pm:

One of the types allows for more items in your inventory.

By Ninja Magic on Sunday, October 27, 2002 - 12:39 pm:

In MR1, size doesn't matter, but upgrading the barn is supposed to help. Like Sharkie said, it might help with stress or fatigue or something. And upgrading the house just lets you hold more items.
